translation.请输入要检查的数据: Please enter the data you want to check
translation.新增分组: A new group has been added
translation.刷新后将跳转首页: After refreshing, you will be redirected to the home page
translation.格式：名称,https://xxxx.m3u + 换行，其中名称需要唯一，如下所: Format: Name, https://xxxx.m3u + line break, where the name needs to be unique as shown below
translation.需要点击【搜索】按钮进行筛选: You need to click the [Search] button to filter
translation.选择延迟最低的源: Select the source with the lowest latency
translation.排序(数据较多时,可能影响排序列表性能,建议分批操作): Sorting (If there is a large amount of data, the performance of the sorted list may be affected, so it is recommended to operate in batches)
translation.结果文件名: The name of the resulting file
translation.检查并发数: Check the number of concurrent transactions
translation.只看频道关键词: Just look at the channel keywords
translation.获取任务失败，请检查服务是否正常启动: If the fetch task fails, check whether the service starts normally
translation.请输入m3u8播放地址: Please enter the M3U8 playback address
translation.请输入待检查数据: Please enter the data to be checked
translation.输入框支持下面几种格式: The input box supports the following formats
translation.支持标准格式的m3u链接，如有多个请用英文逗号做分割符,比如: Supports standard format m3u links, if there are multiple, please use a comma as the separator, for example
translation.支持m3u文件原始内容，类似: Support original content of m3u files, similar to
translation.当前源来自github的iptv-org，如您有相关源链接，请至设置中添加: The current source is from iptv-org on GitHub. If you have relevant source links, please add them in the settings.
translation.当前设置的【后台检查server域名】为: The current setting for 【Background check server domain】 is
translation.对不起，您没有设置【后台检查server域名】，请至设置页面操作后再来查看: I'm sorry, you haven't set the 【Background check server domain】 yet. Please go to the settings page to set it up before checking again.
